answerFilterLayout.name: gene_filters
answerFilterLayout.displayName: Click on a number in this table to limit/filter your results

instance.name: all_ortholog_groups
instance.description: A representative from each ortholog group was chosen alphabetically by species. This number provides an indication of the relatedness of proteins in the result across all represented species.

instance.name: undeprecated_instances
instance.description: all Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB genes (undeprecated).

instance.name: deprecated_instances
instance.description:
Giardia Assemblage A isolate WB deprecated genes.
These are previously annotated genes that newer annotation has shown to have insufficient evidence.

summaryView.name: genomic-view
summaryView.description: View your hits mapped to their corresponding largest assembled genomic DNA segment, often a chromosome, but sometimes a contig or scaffold.

columnAttribute.name: transcripts_found_per_gene
columnAttribute.help: For each gene, how many of its transcripts met search criteria.

columnAttribute.name: transcript_index_per_gene
columnAttribute.help: For each gene, each of its transcripts in this result gets an index number, starting with 1, 2, ...

columnAttribute.name: has_missing_transcripts
columnAttribute.help: This column has a 'yes' if, in this result, some of the gene's transcripts were not matched by the search.

columnAttribute.name: apollo_transcript_description
columnAttribute.help: This product description was added via the Apollo community annotation platform and differs from the product description in the official genome annotation.

columnAttribute.name: apollo_link_out
columnAttribute.help: This links to the Apollo annotation editor for community annotation.

textAttribute.name: snpoverview
textAttribute.text:
Total SNPs All Strains: $$gene_total_hts_snps$$
NonSynonymous SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_nonsynonymous_snps$$
Noncoding SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_noncoding_snps$$
Stop Codon SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_stop_codon_snps$$
Synonymous SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_synonymous_snps$$
Nonsyn/Syn SNP Ratio All Strains: $$gene_hts_nonsyn_syn_ratio$$
